title: Argentina
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 300 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 550L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and X
description: As the second-largest country in South America, Argentina is rich with culture and history. Engage students with fascinating information about this amazing place.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
